document.full_text: new jersey's secretary of state ruled on tuesday that olympic track star carl lewis cannot run for state senate because he did not met the legal requirement that he has lived in the state for four years.
document.title: new jersey official rules carl lewis cannot run for office
lines_and_colors: new jersey's secretary of state ruled on tuesday that olympic track star carl lewis cannot run for state senate because he did not met the legal requirement that he has lived in the state for four years.
